# RFP for Smart Building Program – Regional Standing Offer, Pacific Region

Defense Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking proposals from qualified firms interested in providing smart building services to the Department of National Defense (DND) locations in the Pacific Region. The solicitation is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Regional Standing Offer (SO).

## Key Information

* Solicitation Title: Regional Standing Offer for Smart Building Program
* Solicitation Number: MP2016-75779
* Amendment Number: 6
* Closing Date and Time: April 12, 2023, 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Term: 2 years, with a maximum of 3 additional 1-year periods
* Estimated Value: $2,725,000.00

## Objective
The primary objective of this RFP is to select a single (1) firm to sign a Regional Standing Offer (SO) with DCC to provide services on an "as and when required" basis. The services required include:

* Installation Services (Stand-Alone System)
* Deployment Services (Stand-Alone System)
* Reporting Services (Tier 1, Tier 2, and Tier 3)
* End of Term Services
* Decommissioning Services

## Evaluation Criteria
Bidders will be evaluated based on their qualifications, experience, and proposed services. The evaluation criteria are outlined in the RFP document.

## Contracting Entity
Defense Construction Canada (DCC) is the contracting entity for this RFP. The contract will be managed and administered by DCC.

## Contact Information
For more information about this RFP, please contact:

Amanda Eid
Phone: 343-540-6713
Email: [amanda.eid@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:amanda.eid@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)

## Tender Documents
Bidders can access the tender documents on the MERX electronic bidding system at: [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; see [www.merx.com/public/pricing](http://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.
